body_html:
all the tests should pass

OK -- just so it's clear, I was getting that from #1539 (comment)

I just re-sync'ed to head and still get 38 test failures with --config=cuda, despite the readme saying that the tests are currently passing. Maybe the point of confusion is between "all tests pass" and "all tests pass with --config=cuda"?
